author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Vail Resorts Reports Certain Ski Season Metrics For Season-To-Date Period Ended April 15, 2018
text:
April 19 (Reuters) - Vail Resorts Inc:
* VAIL RESORTS REPORTS CERTAIN SKI SEASON METRICS FOR SEASON-TO-DATE PERIOD ENDED APRIL 15, 2018
* VAIL RESORTS INC - SEASON-TO-DATE TOTAL LIFT TICKET REVENUE AT COMPANY’S NORTH AMERICAN MOUNTAIN RESORTS, WAS UP 3.7%
* VAIL RESORTS - SEASON-TO-DATE SKI SCHOOL REVENUE WAS UP 3.4% AND DINING REVENUE WAS DOWN 1.4%
* VAIL RESORTS INC - SEASON-TO-DATE TOTAL SKIER VISITS FOR COMPANY’S NORTH AMERICAN MOUNTAIN RESORTS WERE DOWN 1.9% Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
